text: Shahjahan Saju is a Jatiya Party (Ershad) politician and the former Member of Parliament of Narsingdi-3. ==Career== Saju was elected to parliament from Narsingdi-3 as a Jatiya Party candidate in 1988. He is the former Narsingdi District council president. ==References== Category:Jatiya Party politicians Category:Living people Category:4th Jatiya Sangsad members Category:Year of birth missing (living people)
title: Shahjahan Saju
